EmailTemplate.name: OTR - DeBree Day 2 Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Per my voice mail message - information on the WEX Fleet One OTR Fuel Card
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Hopefully you received the email I sent you the other day. In case you didn’t, I am taking the liberty of sending you another copy.
Again, I am wondering if you could give me some advice. We help organizations like {!Account.Name} with reducing the operating cost of their fleet operation. I don’t know whom I need to speak with to see if we can help you in this area.
This is where I need some help from you. Who would be the individual (within your organization), if not you, that you would recommend I meet with to look at our services to see if there’s a potential fit?
Specifically what we do is:
- Give you savings – cash price and no transaction fees.
- Provide driver convenience – accepted at 99% of truck stops in the US. - Provide control – real time authorization of card and driver ID.
You can review several testimonials and videos from our customers that tell the story of how:
- WEX Fleet One provides the most detailed reporting in the industry. - WEX Fleet One Customer Service is unparalleled in the industry. - WEX Fleet One customers realize significant cost savings.
I don’t know if we could duplicate these kinds of results with your company, but wouldn’t it be interesting to find out?
I look forward to speaking with you. And, thank you for any advice you can give me.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
{!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
www.fleetone.com
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: "This message contains confidential information of Wright Express Corporation. It is intended only for the use of the designated recipient(s) stated above and further distribution of the information is prohibited. If you have received this message in error, please notify sender immediately by telephone or reply by e-mail and delete the entire message and any attachments."
